story:
My dear son, gather 'round and listen closely, for I have a tale to tell that will transport you to the enchanted lands of our beloved Azerbaijan.

Once upon a time, in the majestic city of Baku, there was a brave and adventurous young boy named Shahriyar. Shahriyar lived in a cozy little apartment on the hill overlooking the sparkling Caspian Sea. He loved to play in the streets, chasing the pigeons and exploring the bustling bazaars.

One evening, while strolling along the seaside promenade, Shahriyar stumbled upon a mysterious old man with a long white beard and piercing blue eyes. The old man introduced himself as a Bahar Baba, a wise and magical guide who possessed the power to reveal the secrets of the universe.

Shahriyar was fascinated by Bahar Baba and asked if he could learn from him. Bahar Baba agreed and took Shahriyar on a magical journey through the night sky. They soared above the city, watching the stars twinkling like diamonds against the velvet blackness. As they flew, Bahar Baba taught Shahriyar about the ancient traditions and legends of our beautiful Azerbaijan.

They saw the majestic mountains of the Greater Caucasus, where eagles soared and wolves roamed free. They passed over the lush green forests, where the ancient trees whispered secrets to the wind. They gazed upon the sparkling waters of the Caspian, where fish swam in schools and the fishermen sang songs of old.

As they flew over the city, Bahar Baba pointed out the magnificent sights: the grand mosques, the ancient fortresses, and the bustling markets. Shahriyar's eyes widened with wonder as he took in the beauty and magic of his homeland.

As the night wore on, Bahar Baba led Shahriyar to a hidden garden, where the most beautiful flowers bloomed under the light of the full moon. In the center of the garden stood an ancient tree, its branches adorned with glittering jewels and glittering beads. Bahar Baba instructed Shahriyar to pluck one of the jewels, which would grant him a single wish.

Shahriyar thought for a moment and then plucked a sparkling blue bead. He wished for the ability to always protect and preserve the beauty and magic of his beloved Azerbaijan, so that future generations could inherit its wonders.

Bahar Baba smiled, and with a wave of his hand, Shahriyar found himself back in his bed, the dream still fresh in his mind. From that night on, Shahriyar was filled with a sense of purpose, determined to do his part in preserving the magic of Azerbaijan.

And so, my dear son, I hope this tale has inspired you to cherish the wonders of our homeland and to always strive to protect its beauty and magic. Remember, the power to make a difference is within you, and with every small action, you can contribute to preserving the magic of Azerbaijan.

Sleep tight, my son, and may your dreams be as vibrant as the colors of our national flag.
